title: Шатуны
description: "Shatuny" is one of the best known novels of Iurii Mamleev. It was written in the 1960s in Moscow, in the period of despair in Russian society. This novel was published in an abridged version in the USA in 1980 under the name "The Sky above Hell", and became the subject of many scholarly works around the world. Iurii Mamleev, a writer and philosopher, winner of several literary awards, who emigrated from Russia in 1974, now lives in Russia.
author: Yuriy Mamleev
